animeDescription: Music video for the song Nijiiro Love Letter by Mio Isayama that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Toshio Nishiuchi.
animeStaff: [['Isayama Mio', ['Theme Song Performance', 'Theme Song Lyrics', 'Theme Song Composition']], ['Nishiuchi Toshio', ['Animation Director']]]
